base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three evenly spaced drawers, each with a handle, stacked vertically in a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame, guided by tracks on the sides. The handles are attached to the front of each drawer, allowing for easy opening and closing. The drawers are designed to hold items securely when closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk for storage. Users interact by pulling the handles to access contents. It can be moved to different locations as needed, providing flexible storage solutions in home or office environments.
